resources: • [Washo and Neighboring Language Vocabulary]. Jacobsen, William H. (researcher). (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:2014-21.002.011
• ONLINE[Plains Miwok vocabulary]. Callaghan, Catherine A. (researcher); McCauley, Aza (consultant). [1958 August 20]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:Callaghan.004
• ONLINEPlains Miwok Dictionary. Callaghan, Catherine A. 1984. University of California Press. oai:refdb.wals.info:5284
• [Plains Miwok texts]. Wash, Suzanne M. (researcher); Walloupe, Mabel (consultant). [2002 November]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:Wash.001.001
• [Plains Miwok texts]. Wash, Suzanne M. (researcher); Walloupe, Mabel (consultant). [2002 November]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:Wash.001.002
• ONLINEMiwok, Plains: a language of United States. n.a. 2013. SIL International. oai:ethnologue.com:pmw

• ONLINELINGUIST List Resources for Miwok, Plains. Damir Cavar, Director of Linguist List (editor); Malgorzata E. Cavar, Director of Linguist List (editor). 2015-11-06. The LINGUIST List (www.linguistlist.org). oai:linguistlist.org:lang_pmw
• ONLINEGlottolog 2.6 Resources for Plains Miwok. n.a. 2015. Max Planck Institute for the Science of Human History. oai:glottolog.org:plai1259
• ONLINEWALS Online Resources for Miwok (Plains). n.a. 2008. Max Planck Institute for Evolutionary Anthropology. oai:wals.info:mwp
• ONLINE[Plains Miwok vocabulary]. Callaghan, Catherine A. (researcher); McCauley, Aza (consultant). [1958 August 20]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:Callaghan.004

• Conversation and elicitation of sentences. Some topics include: How to say "Don't lose it," various verbs (to swim, to get wood, to bother, to teach, to sweat, to come) "a long time ago" vs. in the present. Money-related sentences. . Walloupe, Mabel (consultant). (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.001

• Conversation and elicitation sentences. Some topics include Continuation of verbs (to loan money, to sing, to speak, to have a cold) in present and "a long time ago", handling a hearing aide and other misc. sentences. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.002

• Conversation and elicitation of sentences. Some topics include: To go off and do something in the present and "a long time ago" (to swim, to go get wood, to hunt), M.W.'s family, childhood, buying cars, weather terms, and forgetting the language. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.003

• Conversation and elicitation of sentences. Some topics include: "If _, then _ " sentences, M.W.'s grandchildren, being afraid, dreaming of being a doctor, being time to leave, wanting to go home. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.004

• Conversation and elicitation of sentences. Some topics include: M.W.'s dancing as a child, remembering the language, talking, swimming (in Northern Sierra Miwok), a woman who used to yell and got locked up. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.005

• Conversation and elicitation of sentences. Some topics include: baby powder, the rain, coughing, dancing (various constructions: past, present, future, imperative, etc.), to dream something, conditional constructions (using "if") about being Indian and speaking "better.". n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.006

• Conversation and elicitation of words and sentences. Some topics include: sleeping, the woman in the bed next to M.W., Indian dance, M.W.'s not wanting to dance, stockings and shoes. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.007

• Conversation and elicitation of sentences. Some topics include: helping M.W. walk, giving candy to children, the woman making noises in the bed next to M.W., "I never told you..." and similar sentences, to watch dance, to leave something at mother's house, the rain, "If I were you, I would(n't)...". n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.008

• Conversation and elicitation of sentences. Conjugation: "_ dreamed that _ was/were (a) doctor(s)", "If _ was/were and Indian, _ would speak better." Other misc. sentences. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.009

• Conversation and elicitation of words and sentences. Some topics include: the weather, a jackrabbit, friends, crying, to hit with a car, "What happened to the man that...". n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.010

• Conversation and elicitation of sentences. Some topics include: walking a lot, storms, M.W. tells a story in English and Miwok about an accident she had during a storm. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.011

• Conversation and elicitation of words and sentences. Some topics include: "cuss" words, back rubbing, "I was _ when he came," to think something happened, M.W.'s daughter, crying baby. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.012

• Conversation and elicitation of words and sentences. Some topics include: food vocab., twins, a well, M.W.'s parents, hair, going to the store, getting married, "What happened to that man you wanted to marry?". n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.013
• Continue conversation and elicitation of words and sentences related to "the man you were going to marry".. n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.014
• Conversation and elicitation of words and sentences. Some topics include: back rubbing, requests, hair pillows, colors. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.015

• Conversation and elicitation of words and sentences. Some topics include: "Conversation about that man you wanted to marry," combing hair, hair types, questions and responses about 'what you did with the car.'. n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.016

• Conversation and elicitation of sentences. Some topics include: Questions and responses about 'what happened' to various people and things, drinking water, Wash knowing a lot of Miwok, M.W.'s son forgetting Miwok. Conversation about Northern Sierra Miwok.. n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.017

• Conversation and elicitation of words and sentences. Some topics include: M.W.'s attempt to teach her granddaughter to count in Miwok, breaking things, "What happened to the _ (that) you _" sentences and responses, "If _, then _" sentences. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.018

• Conversation and elicitation of words and sentences. Some topics include: Wash going home and returning in a couple of months, weather related terms, M.W.'s granddaughters and other family members. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.019

• Long discussion in English about misc. personal things (family, health, etc.). Conversation and elicitation of words and sentences. Some topics include: airplanes and flying, Native American languages, questions using "where" and "who" and responses. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.020

• Conversation and elicitation of words and sentences. Some topics include: M.W.'s childhood, getting married, Big Times and roundhouses, M.W.'s family. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.021

• Conversation and elicitation of words and sentences. Some topics include: coals, M.W. not having anyone to speak Miwok to, M.W.'s husband, acorn soup, food names, M.W.'s mother and father, meals, to be hungry. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.022

• Conversation and elicitation of words and sentences about a machine talking, discussion about visits, "hot, warm, cold" things, several verbs in first person progressive form. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.023

• Conversation and elicitation of sentences. Some topics include: greetings, stolen items, weather related sentences, to drown, to get a hair cut, to get caught, to slide. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.024

• Conversation and elicitation of sentences. Some topics include: to find something, more "If _, then _" type sentences, onions making people cry, to fool someone to be fooled, to know (people, places), M.W.'s dreams and her health. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.025
• Conversation and elicitation of words and sentences. Some topics include: M.W.'s past, fire and fireplaces. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.026

• Conversation and elicitation of words and sentences. Some topics include: M.W.'s dreams (also daydreams caused by her medication), to trip over something, to trip someone, to like something, M.W.'s work with Catherine Callahan. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.027

• Conversation and elicitation of sentences. Some topics include: to follow someone, to run, to lose something, to close and open things, fans, acorn soup. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.028

• Conversation and elicitation of words and sentences. Some topics include: weather, dead things, being cold, being spicy, to chase and be chased, to help walk, to make crazy, M.W.'s father's language (Northern Sierra Miwok) and her childhood. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.029

• Conversation and elicitation of words and sentences. Some topics include: M.W. tells a childhood experience when other kids were mean to her, to put things places, to know someone, M.W's son David, household chores, cooking and food. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.030

• Conversation and elicitation of sentences. Some topics include: drinking water, dogs chasing people, lack of Miwok speakers, going in a house, to be scared, to follow someone. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.031

• Wash plays tape from Catherine Callahan of Text 1: Coyote Steals the Sun. Discussion of text in English. Conversation and elicitation of words and sentences (some related to text 1). Some topics include: to wait until..., to be a talker, keys, to look for someone/something, to drink (past), to get out (of a hole). . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.032

• Conversation and elicitation of sentences (some related to Text 1). Some topics include: to get out a hole, to do something or to be something again, to be stung by a bee (everyday), to get sleepy, to shoot a deer. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.033

• Conversation and elicitation of words and sentences (some related to Text 1). Some topics include: Big Times, meals, sifting flour and sifters, to skate, tools. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.034

• Conversation and elicitation of words and sentences (some related to Text 1). Some topics include: sweeping and raking, cats and dogs, to trip (with a stick), the deaths of M.W.s' mother and husband, to follow someone, arm being asleep/twitching, "The sun didn't used to set in the west" and related sentences, weather, making baskets. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.035

• Conversation and elicitation of words and sentences (some related to Text 1). Some topics include: Coyote going hunting and seeing the sun in the east, Chiefs, M.W.'s family, "When I was little, I wanted to...". n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.036

• Conversation and elicitation of sentences (some related to Text 1). Some topics include: forgetting the language, M.W.'s grandson, to used to want to do things, Coyote wanting to steal the sun. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.037

• Conversation and elicitation of sentences. Some topics include: questions (mostly WH- words, some "Is that...") and responses. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.038

• Conversation and elicitation of sentences related to Text 1: Coyote telling the people he was going to steal the sun, the people not believing him, his journey, Coyote falling asleep under a tree and becoming a stick, which the Chief saw. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.039

• Conversation and elicitation of sentences related to Text 1: The Chief tries to burn the stick but it jumps out of the fire. When the Chief falls asleep, Coyote steals the sun. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.040

• Conversation and elicitation of words and sentences related to Text 2: Acorn soup preparation. Picking, peeling, pounding, drying, and putting water on acorns. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.041

• Conversation and elicitation of sentences (some related to Text 2). Topics include: M.W.'s health, acorn skin, stolen earrings, pounding acorns. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.042

• Conversation and elicitation of sentences (some related to Text 2). Topics include: the pounding rock, M.W.'s parents' languages, M.W.'s dreams and her twin brothers. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.043
• Message from M.W. to the Jeffs in Northern Sierra Miwok. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.044

• Conversation and elicitation of sentences related to Text 2: Acorn Soup Preparations. About grinding and sifting the acorns. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.045

• Conversation and elicitation of words and sentences related to Text 2: sifting basket, ground corn (flour), M.W.'s mother's preparation of acorn soup. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.046

• Conversation and elicitation of words and sentences related to Text 2: tortillas, raking wood chips in to a hole, preparing the hole, etc. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.047

• Conversation and elicitation of kitchen related words: Wash reads a story in English about acorns, and further conversation and elicitation about acorn soup. (Text 3: Acorn). . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.048
• Conversation and elicitation related to acorn soup.. n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.049

• Conversation and elicitation related to acorn soup (for Text 3) and a new story about Coyote and Lizard (Text 4: Coyote and Lizard). Some discussion about Jeff's family. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.050
• Conversation and elicitation related to Text 4. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.051

• Conversation and elicitation related to Text 4 and conversational phrases, especially related to how M.W. used to communicate with her family. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.052

• Conversation and elicitation, mostly related to how M.W. used to communicate with her family (continued). Also sentences about fighting at beginning. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.053

• Long preparation period (around 18') at beginning, some discussion about M.W. not having anyone to speak Miwok with, followed by conversation and elicitation related to Text 4. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.054
• Conversation and elicitation related to Text 4. Some questions from Catherine Callahan, mostly related to Text 1. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.055
• Conversation and elicitation related to Text 5 & 6: Big Times 1 & 2. Some conventional phrases expressing gratitude. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.056

• Conversation and elicitation of conversational phrases about going somewhere, expressing apologies and sympathy, talking about the weather, expressing congratulations, compliments, delight. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.057

• Wash reads English and Miwok version of Text 2, M.W. comments. Conversation elicitation of words and sentences related to text. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.058

• Conversation and elicitation of sentences about Catherine Callahan, Mexican flour soup, time of day: early/late/etc., the weather, family members, not speaking Miwok, trains. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.059

• More conversation and elicitation about Catherine Callahan. Also: responses to "Where are you going?", sentences used in introductions ("This is...", etc.)., discourse information: expressing agreement or disagreement and interruption, about M.W.'s mother not allowing her to play in the house when company was over. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.060
• More conversation and elicitation related to playing outside, furniture and other house related things. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.061

• Conversation and elicitation related to body parts, sickness, health. Wash reads in English Text 8: School days, conversation and elicitation related to the text.. n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.062

• Conversation and elicitation related to Text 9: School Days (Northern Sierra Miwok version of Text 8), sentences about birthdays, Text 10: My Granddaughter, sentences about how no one talks Indian anymore, misc. sentences, Text 11: My Cold Feet. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.063

• Conversation and elicitation related to Text 12: Falling in the hospital, Text 13: Traveling - visiting David and Janet, Text 14: Hawaii. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.064
• Conversation and elicitation related to Texts 8 & 9. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.065

• Conversation and elicitation related to Text 15 (PM): No One Speaks Miwok Anymore, Text 16: My Father (in Northern Sierra Miwok), sentences about going to the bathroom (in PM and NSM), Text 17: My Mother's Father, sentences about M.W.'s mother, grandmother and brothers. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.066

• Conversation and elicitation of conversational phrases in PM and NSM: offering food/drink to a guest, inviting someone to stay for a meal, offering help or assistance, 'where are you going' and various possible responses, introducing members of one's family, things to say when you meet people for the first time, asking permission to speak with someone (as when you come to someone's house, or call on the telephone), 'where is [name of person]?' and various possible responses, talking about time and telling time. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.067
• Conversation and elicitation of sentences related to Text 1. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.068
• Conversation and elicitation of words and sentences related to Big Times, making earrings, basket making, and juice. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.069
• More conversation and elicitation of words and sentences related to Big Times, pots boiling over, ironing, the weather. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.070

• Listen to a short recording of Manuel Jeff, conversation about famous people, conversation and elicitation of words related to the weather, dances, and Roundhouses, wedding congratulations. English conversation about apartment and belongings M.W. used to have. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.071
• Conversation and elicitation related to Text 18: On Mrs. Walloupe's marriage, in-laws, and the nephew she helped raise.. n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.072

• Conversation in English about recording traditional activities/places and about BigTimes. M.W. translates some Miwok sentences into English from June 22, 1994 session. Conversation in English related to games, her memories of dances when she was a child, her son, several related elicitations. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.073

• Conversation and elicitation related to Text 19: First Time I Rode in a Car, Text 20: First Time I Rode in a Car (in Northern Sierra Miwok), Text 21: On Mrs. Walloupe's granddaughter learning to speak Miwok in school (in Northern Sierra Miwok). Conversation and elicitation about M.W.'s husband being skinny and fat. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.074

• Conversation and elicitation related to Text 23: On Speaking Miwok, types of rings, body parts, Text 24: Miwok in Schools (in Northern Sierra Miwok), and Text 25: Miwok in the Schools. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.075

• Conversation and elicitation related to Text 26: Captain Charlie Maximo's Big Time (in Northern Sierra Miwok), Text 27: Captain Charlie Maximo's Big Time, death related matters, Text 28: On where some of Mrs. Walloupe's family are buried (Wash not sure if NSM or PM). . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.076

• Discussion about Mrs. Walloupe's brothers. Conversation and elicitation relating to Text 29: Helping Around the House (Wash not sure if NSM or PM). A lot of conversation in English, elicitation of misc. phrases. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.077

• Conversation and elicitation related to Text 31: First Time I Rode in an Airplane (In mixed NSM and PM?), misc. sentences. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.079

• Conversation and elicitation related to Text 32: Big Times 3 (In mixed NSM and PM?), Text 33: Alvin Visiting Mrs. Walloupe (NSM or PM?). Also contains misc. conversation in English. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.080

• Conversation and elicitation related to Text 26: Captain Charlie Maximos' Big Time (in Northern Sierra Miwok), Text 27: Captain Charlie Maximo's Big Time, Big Time in Jackson Valley, using string as calendar and misc. discussion in English. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.081

• Conversation and elicitation related to Mrs. Walloupe's cousin (Bernice Alex), Text 34: On Indian Dancing (In mixed NSM and PM?). n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.082

• Conversation and elicitation of conversation sentences and misc. other sentences related to Big Times, broken boards, etc. (In NSM and PM).. n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.083

• Conversation and elicitation of sentences related to breaking a board in half, Text 35: About one of Mrs. Walloupe's former neighbors. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.084

• Conversation and elicitation of sentences related to a message for Manuel Jeff, Katherine Callaghan. M.W.'s grandmother, M.W.'s mother's language, Manuel Jeff, using the verb 'to return', etc. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.085
• Conversation and elicitation of words and sentences related to: various actions of a hypothetical man, juice.. n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.086

• Conversation and elicitation related to Text 36: The Walloupe family, Text 37: When I Moved Out of my Apartment, Text 38: My Son David. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.087

• Conversation and elicitation of words related to meals. Also, conversational phrases and conversation in English about famous people, etc. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.088

• Conversation and elicitation of conversational phrases and misc. sentences related to being afraid, liking someone, etc, Text 18: On Mrs. Walloupe's marriage, in-laws, and the nephew she helped to raise. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.089
• Conversation in English about food, elicitation and conversation continued about Text 18. . n.a. (:unas). California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 196.090
